sentences.en: ...foods rich in cholesterol and saturated fats.
sentences.cn: ...富含胆固醇和饱和脂肪的食物。

sentences.en: a saturated solution of sodium chloride
As the domestic market becomes saturated, firms begin to export the product.
sentences.cn: 由于国内市场饱和，各公司开始外销。

sentences.en: As the market was saturated with goods and the economy became more balanced, inflation went down.
sentences.cn: 随着市场上商品饱和，经济趋于平衡，通货膨胀就减弱了。

sentences.en: Cashews rich in saturated fat, should be avoided.
sentences.cn: 腰杲饱和脂肪太多, 应当避免食用.

sentences.en: His work clothes, having become saturated with oil, had to be cleaned.
sentences.cn: 他的工作服已经被油浸透，该洗洗了。

sentences.en: It is important to state whether the liquid is air - free or air - saturated.
sentences.cn: 指出液体是不含空气的,还是被空气饱和了的,这一点很重要.

sentences.en: Items meant to stand out are best rendered in saturated colors.
sentences.cn: 需要突出的元素最好用饱和颜色来渲染,次重要的元素用欠饱和颜色渲染.

sentences.en: Rapid melting of the snow saturated debris in a large landslide.
sentences.cn: 积雪的急剧融化使大滑坡中的岩屑饱和.

sentences.en: The air was saturated with the perfume of the flowers.
sentences.cn: 空气中充满着花的芬芳.

sentences.en: The continuous rain had saturated the soil.
sentences.cn: 连绵不断的雨把土地淋了个透。

sentences.en: The market for the used car is saturated.
The market has been saturated with paintings like that.
The room was saturated with the aroma of coffee.
sentences.cn: 那房间弥漫着咖啡的芳香.

sentences.en: We were caught in the rain and came home saturated.
sentences.cn: 我们挨了雨淋,回家时已浑身湿透.

words.tran_cn: 浸透的，饱和的；深颜色的
饱和；色饱和度；浸透；磁化饱和
浸透，使湿透；使饱和，使充满
饱和的；渗透的；深颜色的

trans.tran_cn: 饱和的，浸透的，（颜色）未被白色弄淡的
浸透( saturate的过去式和过去分词)，使饱和，使充满
